function_call.name: classify_risks_framework
function_call.arguments: {"sorted_risks":[{"name":"Inability to locate people without face masks in densely populated areas due to the limitations of the system.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"System failure when there is a problem in the network, leading to the inability to send information about violators via sms.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"The system relies on facial image data, potentially raising privacy concerns for individuals whose images are used for training and detection.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"The use of a facial mask detection system may lead to a false sense of security among the public, potentially reducing adherence to other important preventive measures for covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on a technology-driven approach without addressing underlying social and behavioral factors may overlook the root causes of non-compliance with mask-wearing rules.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Screening for individuals not wearing facial masks","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Overfitting in the training data","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Fluctuating testing loss and decrease in prediction confidence","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Collection of images from different sources","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependence on convolutional neural network cnn architecture","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Risk of overfitting in the neural network","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of face mask compliance in public places","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of driverless vehicles for monitoring scenarios across the city","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Deployment of sensors and real-time monitoring may infringe on privacy rights.","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Real-time tracking of individuals’ movements raises ethical and legal concerns.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of interconnected devices and iot for tracking patients may lead to data breaches and security vulnerabilities.","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Use of insufficiently fitted face masks","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Insufficient data sharing during covid-19 outbreak in smart city networks","category":"Society","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate detection and prediction of disease spread in urban areas","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Reliance on facial recognition technology for mask detection","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Privacy and surveillance concerns with cctv camera use","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Dependency on iot sensors for data collection","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Global spread of novel coronavirus covid-19 causing a pandemic.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Non-compliance with social distancing and mask-wearing guidelines accelerating the spread of covid-19.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Limited use of deep learning techniques in object detection for face mask monitoring.","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Indoor activities are closely related to virus spreading risk","category":"Structure","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of private space in homes during pandemic","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate ventilation and air quality in homes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate solid-waste management in homes","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of awareness about the importance of room ventilation in reducing covid-19 risk","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Inadequate indoor air quality due to limited ventilation and recirculation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of effective remote work infrastructure leading to prolonged indoor isolation","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium"},{"name":"Covid-19 spread indoors","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus droplets staying in the air","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Contact surface contamination","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate building design for fighting airborne viruses and maintaining healthy conditions for occupants during quarantine and stay-at-home orders.","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate sanitation and wastewater management in residential buildings, leading to the potential spread of viruses through sewage.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate bathroom infrastructure in residential buildings for preventing virus transmission between occupants during quarantine.","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Poor ventilation leading to increased transmission of viruses","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate distancing measures leading to higher risk of virus transmission","category":"Interactions","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Lack of hygiene facilities leading to poor sanitation and disease spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Viral transmission in buildings and transportation","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Environmental contamination in hospitals","category":"Society","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Changes in building activities and layouts due to covid-19","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Virus transmission in crowded and poorly ventilated rooms","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Inadequate building design for preventing virus spread","category":"Structure","confidence":"High"},{"name":"Negative impact on economic progress","category":"Simple","confidence":"Simple"},{"name":"Development and sharing of data models for infectious diseases","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Lack of machine-readable epidemiological quantitative data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"},{"name":"Inadequate sharing of epidemiological quantitative data","category":"Interactions","confidence":"Medium-high"}]}
